ADLXWrapper
Table of Contents

Class ADLXPowerTuningServicesHelper

Namespace
ADLXWrapper
Assembly
ADLXWrapper.dll

Wrapper over IADLXPowerTuningServices selecting the highest available interface (if extended) and exposing change handling.

public sealed class ADLXPowerTuningServicesHelper : IDisposable
Inheritance
object
ADLXPowerTuningServicesHelper

ADLXPowerTuningServicesHelper(IADLXPowerTuningServices*, bool)

Creates a power tuning helper from the native services interface, upgrading to v1 when available.

public ADLXPowerTuningServicesHelper(IADLXPowerTuningServices* services, bool addRef = true)

Parameters

services IADLXPowerTuningServices*

Native power tuning services pointer.

addRef bool

True to AddRef the pointer for this helper.
